post_title: FS: Only PSA 4.5 Revelle remains! (Price drop 11/1)
post_content:
I have a group of PSA 4-4.5 Southern Leaguers with Piedmont backs available. Price includes tracked shipping

Will consider trades for PSA 4-4.5 of Carey, Guiheen, Persons, Sid Smith or Thornton.

Thanks for looking!

$SOLD King PSA 4
$SOLD Miller PSA 4
$SOLD Rockenfeld PSA 4
[STRIKE]$500[/STRIKE] $400 Revelle PSA 4.5
